name: Love Hell
description:
Love Hell is a cross between a visual novel and a bullet hell where you have to battle your emotions in order to talk to the boy you love.

This is a light-hearted experience that can be experienced by all. But if you so dare to choose the hard difficulty, you will have to put your skills to the test.

Status

The current build includes the full experience to the game, but in the future there will be updates to include more dialogue options and branching storylines.

Credits
